title: 93/122/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 January 1993 granting the Italian Republic a partial derogation on the submission of data on the landings of fishery products as required by Council Regulation (EEC) No 1382/91 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 January 1993 granting the Italian Republic a partial derogation on the submission of data on the landings of fishery products as required by Council Regulation (EEC) No 1382/91 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
(93/122/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: By way of derogation from Article 3 (1) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1382/91, the Italian Republic shall submit the data on the items indicated in Annex I to this Decision.
The derogation referred to in Article 1 is granted for the data relating to the period ending on 31 December 1994.
The Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 January 1993.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 133, 28. 5. 1991, p. 1.
ANNEX
Data to be submitted by the Italian Republic for the period ending on 31 December 1994  Landings for the month of . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 19 . . . . . . Country: ITALY
